channel.title: Moparcraft - Advertisement section rules [10/06/12]
channel.description:
This board is designed for you to post your minecraft server in, it would be best if you included in depth information about your server, as well as media and so on but it is not a requirement. Please take your time to read the following rules of this board:
[b]1)[/b] No selling admin/mod/any staff position on your server/site
[b]2)[/b] No posting infected downloads/links/or anything relating to anything infected
[b]3)[/b] Only one thread per server, do NOT post multiple topics for one server.
[b]4)[/b] Do not spam other peoples threads with advertisements of another server.
There rules may change at any time, so ensure you keep up to date with this topic.

item.title: Moparcraft - Advertisement section rules [10/06/12]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

This board is designed for you to post your minecraft server in, it would be best if you included in depth information about your server, as well as media and so on but it is not a requirement. Please take your time to read the following rules of this board:

1) No selling admin/mod/any staff position on your server/site

2) No posting infected downloads/links/or anything relating to anything infected

3) Only one thread per server, do NOT post multiple topics for one server.

4) Do not spam other peoples threads with advertisements of another server.

There rules may change at any time, so ensure you keep up to date with this topic.
